body_html:
@Flock1 are you still having this problem? This looks like specifying a GPU that doesn't exist. Your GPU comes with a 'n' devices; if you try to use device >= 'n' then you'll get this error.

If you do have enough devices, then there might be a problem with your CUDA installation.

body:
@Flock1 are you still having this problem? This looks like specifying a GPU that doesn't exist. Your GPU comes with a 'n' devices; if you try to use device >= 'n' then you'll get this error.

If you do have enough devices, then there might be a problem with your CUDA installation.
